name: Translations
description: Add or retrieve translations for a video

common_query_routes.Name: video_id
common_query_routes.Description: The ID of the video you wish to add or retrieve translations for

query_parameters.Name: token
query_parameters.Description: The token used to associate the request with a translator

request_body.Name: language
request_body.Description: The language that has been translated to

request_body.Name: transcription
request_body.Description: The original content that has been translated

request_body.Name: start
request_body.Description: The video timestamp (in ms) the translation should start being displayed at

request_body.Name: end
request_body.Description: The video timestamp (in ms) the translation should stop being displayed at

query_routes.Name: language_code
query_routes.Description: The language to retrieve translations for

query_parameters.Name: since
query_parameters.Description: Only retrieve translations that occur after the specified timestamp (in ms)

query_parameters.Name: translators
query_parameters.Description: Only retrieve translations that were made by the specified translators

query_parameters.Name: exclude
query_parameters.Description: Only retrieve translations that were not made by the specified translators

name: Translators
description: Retrieve information about translators that have registered with LiveTL

alert.message: Warning: routes on this endpoint will change as we transition away from using Firebase as a backend

routes.description: Retrieve a list of all translators

query_parameters.Name: type
query_parameters.Description: Only retrieve translators of the specified type

query_parameters.Name: source
query_parameters.Description: Only retrieve translators from the specified source. Defaults to `fb`

routes.description: Retrieve a list of all translators that have registered with LiveTL

query_parameters.Name: source
query_parameters.Description: Only retrieve translators from the specified source. Defaults to `fb`

routes.description: Retrieve a translator matching the specified ID

query_routes.Name: translator_id
query_routes.Description: The ID of the translator to retrieve

query_parameters.Name: source
query_parameters.Description: Specify which source to retrieve translators from
